name: spx-masonry
description: Arrange images in a masonry layout.

properties.name: bpColumns
properties.description: Columns for different screen sizes. Example value: 1000:3;600:2 - this will switch to a three column layout when the screen size is under 1000px and to a two column layout under 600px.

properties.name: imageSize
properties.description: WordPress media size when using the helper function..

properties.name: images
properties.description: Gets images from an ACF or Metabox field.

properties.name: imagesSrc
properties.description: Gets images from an ACF or Metabox field.
